backend/main.mo: Main actor implementing marketplace logic including products, categories, carts, orders, user profiles, and admin authorization with migration support.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting legacy orders to the new format by adding an address field while preserving other marketplace data.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping product features to affected frontend files, components, and test requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend components, pages, hooks, and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind styles defining color tokens, dark mode variables, and base UI styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading the main TypeScript entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack Router route tree and wraps the application in theme and toaster providers.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminProdu: UI help card explaining how admins can add products and listing required product fields.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthControl: Provides sign-in/out controls and an account dropdown with profile and admin links based on authentication and role state.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Shows a dialog prompting new authenticated users to enter and save their display name.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Wraps protected content and displays a sign‑in prompt when the user is not authenticated.
frontend/src/components/cart/MobileCartS: Renders a floating mobile-only cart button showing the item count and linking to the cart.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the app’s main layout including header, footer, routed content, profile setup, and mobile cart shortcut.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Displays footer info with dynamic year and a link attribution including a tracked app identifier.
frontend/src/components/layout/HeaderBar: Renders the top navigation bar with logo, navigation links, cart button, and auth controls.
frontend/src/components/marketplace/Cate: Displays a horizontal selectable list of product categories with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/marketplace/Prod: Shows a clickable card for a product with image, category badge, title, and price.
Renders a responsive grid of product cards with skeletons, error handling, and empty-state messaging.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance based on identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: Provides cart retrieval, item count, subtotal calculation, and mutations for adding, updating, and removing items.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Fetches current user profile and role using identity and actor to determine admin status.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, loading stored identities, and exposing auth status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for products, categories, orders, checkout, and profile operations via an actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminSellerPage.tsx: Admin page for managing products and bootstrapping admin access with forms, dialogs, and CRUD actions.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays cart items with quantity updates, removal, and checkout navigation requiring identity login.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Handles multi-step checkout including address entry, payment selection, and placing orders via mutation.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Shows confirmation details for a placed order with navigation options.
frontend/src/pages/OrdersPage.tsx: Displays the user's orders with loading, error, and empty states, using badges for status and formatted totals.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailsPage.ts: Shows product details with image, description, quantity controls, and add‑to‑cart logic including authentication checks.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Provides authenticated users a profile view with principal ID display, editable name field, and profile‑save actions.
frontend/src/pages/StorefrontPage.tsx: Renders the storefront with hero section, search, category filtering, and a product grid fed by query hooks.
frontend/src/utils/currency.ts: Formats numeric amounts into INR currency strings with no decimals.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for extracting, persisting, and clearing URL and session‑stored parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, container settings, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, including goals for a Meesho‑like marketplace, architectural notes, known issues related to admin access and checkout, and a list of implemented features. Serves as the central description of current capabilities and problems.
